items.name: Spend 1 honbuck
items.description: You buy this and then you have 1 less honbuck.

items.name: Gambling Token
items.description: High risk gambling token; Allows you to bet above the usual limit, up to 5000 with a 1.25x payout if you win.

items.name: Draw 4 Me
items.description: Redeem this to have [me] draw something you specify or photoshop something. Quality not guaranteed but it will be handmade :)
